title: SMNTY Classics: How the Anti-Abortion Movement Fueled the Riot at the Capitol
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: How the Anti-Abortion Movement Fueled the Riot at the Capitol
description:
With the recent anniversary of Roe v Wade and the violence at the US Capitol, guest Bridget Todd examines the link between the riot at the Capitol, the anti-abortion movement and disinformation in this classic episode. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: stuff mom never told you, momstuff, mom stuff, anney reese, smnty, feminism, feminist, activism, social justice, samantha mcvey, abortion, roe v wade, anti-abortion, capital riot, insurrection, american insurrection
